name: Elixir: In search of youth
description:
Elixir_windows.zip - main English version for "Indie Game Making Contest: Rebirth".

Elixir_osx.zip - English version for Mac OS X (I don't have Mac OS X, so I don't know how to properly install and use this build on Mac).

Elixir_linux.zip - English version for Linux.

Elixir_windows_russian_version.zip - version for Windows in russian.

Elixir_linux_russian_version.zip - version for Linux in russian.
